items/other/misc/medium_barn_black_bluep: Use this item to place a medium white barn construction site on your farm! Requirements to build: 125 wood, 100 stone.
items/other/misc/medium_barn_red_bluepri: Use this item to place a medium red barn construction site on your farm! Requirements to build: 125 wood, 100 stone.
items/other/misc/medium_coop_black_bluep: Use this item to place a medium white coop construction site on your farm! Requirements to build: 100 wood, 75 stone.
items/other/misc/medium_coop_red_bluepri: Use this item to place a medium red coop construction site on your farm! Requirements to build: 100 wood, 75 stone.
